name: Agile Informatics
description: ORACLE OPEN WORLD offers more opportunit
overview:
Agile Informatics is an IT Services Company headquartered in California, US. We offer Application Development, Business Process Outsourcing Services through our Global Delivery Centers across the globe. Taking care of the emerging trends we pride ourselves in being a flexible company with a blend of Offsite, Onsite and Offshore modes.

Agile Informatics’ Application development team constantly evolves according to the evolving business and operational needs of the market. We are always ready to challenge the existing norms of technology and provide powerful yet simple modes of delivery. Customized approach to the client and product in question is always the paramount objective of Agile.

We at Agile, consider that the major chunk of world business is driven by SMEs, thus we provide skills to nurture the same. Our BPO services help our clients in domain expertise, process skills and evolving technology platforms to deliver cost effective outsourcing solutions.

At Agile, we understand the power of a service-centric approach to IT, and we have the human and technological resources to help you grasp that potential. We can help you design, implement and support your IT service platforms.
